description: Aegis Brands Inc. engages in the food and beverage business in Canada. It owns and operates coffeehouses under the Bridgehead name; and offers coffee and tea products. As of December 26, 2021, the company owned 21 coffeehouses. It also provides back-office services to support its retail operating brands. The company was formerly known as The Second Cup Ltd. And changed its name to Aegis Brands Inc. in September 2020. Aegis Brands Inc. was founded in 1975 and is based in Markham, Canada.
